reviews.review_text: Best thing about this game are the CONTROLS! So tight! I played this before at events, but I haven't tried it with a keyboard until now, that works suprisingly well too!  Soundtrack is simply amazing.

Good shooter classic game..  Good sountrack, 'Survival..' i like that.. Easy control fun fun fun fun gameplay, a game will make u spend a few hours together with friend,girlfriend,family, and others..   Overall, this is Good Game...
